belongs_to_collection.name: Die Kirche bleibt im Dorf Collection

overview: Green meadows, blue sky in Swabia: Actually, the world of the two villages Oberrieslingen and Unterrieslingen should be in perfect order. But she is not. Why? Because the two hostile villages have had to share a church and a cemetery since the Middle Ages, which has caused squabbles and squalor to this day.
title: Die Kirche bleibt im Dorf
